content: pattern available via internet archive 1 to complete this pattern you will also need - fiberfill - two 1/2 2-hole buttons - sportweight black yarn - size 0 zero crochet hook gauge is unimportant as long as your stitches are tight and the stuffing does not show through 1 http //web archive org/web/20080702225702/http //www yarncat com/camosnake html
